name: automerge-backend-wasm
description: wasm-bindgen bindings to the automerge-backend rust implementation

scripts.build: rm -rf pkg-node pkg-bundler && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-name index --out-dir pkg-node && wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-name index --out-dir pkg-bundler
scripts.release: rm -rf pkg-node pkg-bundler && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --release --out-name index --out-dir pkg-node && wasm-pack build --target bundler --release --out-name index --out-dir pkg-bundler
scripts.profiling: rm -rf pkg-node pkg-bundler && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --profiling --out-name index --out-dir pkg-node && wasm-pack build --target bundler --profiling --out-name index --out-dir pkg-bundler
